summary: This is an email from an Assistant U.S. Attorney to Alex Acosta, forwarding a link to a New York Magazine article about Jeffrey Epstein. It indicates the article was being circulated among federal prosecutors in December 2007.

persons.name: Alex Acosta
persons.context: Recipient of an email forwarding a New York Magazine article about Jeffrey Epstein. He was the U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of Florida at the time.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the New York Magazine article being forwarded in the email.

connections.description: Acosta, as U.S. Attorney, was the recipient of information (an article) about Epstein, indicating Epstein was a subject of interest to his office.

events.title: Email Forwarding Epstein Article
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney emails Alex Acosta a link to a New York Magazine article about Jeffrey Epstein.

locations: 500 S. Australian Ave, Suite 400, West Palm Beach, FL 33401
keyFacts: On December 10, 2007, an Assistant U.S. Attorney emailed Alex Acosta a link to a New York Magazine article about Jeffrey Epstein.
The email originated from the U.S. Attorney's Office in West Palm Beach, Florida.
This shows federal prosecutors were actively monitoring media coverage of Epstein in late 2007.
